Room.Name: Tristram's Temple
Room.ShortDescription: This is Tristram's temple, on level one of the underground city.
Room.LongDescription: True children of Tristram may rest here, where the palpable glow of holiness will speed the healing of their wounds. The beauty of this place, from the marble pillars to the intricate statue of Tristram, will also gladden their hearts. To the south, steps lead back into the underground city.
